input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Quest Sleeveless Jersey Men's'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Livelli Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Attack Long-Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Flanders Warm Base Layer'
  - Name='Assos Uma GTC Jersey C2'
  - Name='Castelli Pericolo Jersey FZ'
  - Name='Castelli Perfetto RoS 2 Convertible Jacket'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Free Speed 3 Top'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Quest Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Privateer I.S Pro Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Peter Sagan Bomber Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Monocrom Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Men's Fresh Limited Edition Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Trail SS Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI GPM Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='ASSOS Uma Gt Jersey C2 Gruppetto'
  - Name='Castelli Traguardo Jersey FZ'
  - Name='Castelli Superleggera A/C Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Free Speed Race Tri Jersey'
  - Name='Men's PEARL iZUMi Summit Wind Jacket Surf Spray'
  - Name='Sportful Doro Jersey Jacket'
  - Name='Man Sportful Light Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pac Summit Men's Aero Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful SB 25 Women's Jersey'
  - Name='GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Signal Cycling Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Quest Sleeveless Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey but sleeveless, differs in sleeve style and likely fabric construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Livelli Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey similar in purpose, likely similar features and fit; very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack Long-Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey shares similar performance intent but differs in sleeve length and possibly fabric weight.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Flanders Warm Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer rather than primary jersey; serves different layering purpose but used in cycling.
High-end cycling jersey similar in intended use, construction, and features.
Cycling jersey with full zipper, close in product category and function.
Convertible jacket, more of an outer layer than a basic jersey, thus moderately relevant.
Cycling top, likely similar but may differ in design or insulation level.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Quest Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cycling jersey product but for women; highly relevant as core function is the same.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Privateer I.S Pro Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Professional style cycling jersey, similar intended use and design.
Bomber jacket style, heavier and different construction; less relevant than standard jersey.
Thermal cycling jersey shares function but designed for colder weather; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Men's Fresh Limited Edition Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey with probable similar materials and features.
Short sleeve cycling jersey, likely similar technical features but possibly with trail-specific fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI GPM Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey, similar technical use but differs in sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Uma Gt Jersey C2 Gruppetto
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling jersey closely matching reference in construction and function.
Cycling jersey with front zipper, similar in use and construction.
Lightweight cycling jersey designed for ventilation; relevant though may differ in fabric tech.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Free Speed Race Tri Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Race tri jersey variant, shares cycling jersey features but specialized for triathlon.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's PEARL iZUMi Summit Wind Jacket Surf Spray
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wind jacket not a cycling jersey; different function and construction.
Jersey jacket suggests heavier or windproof layer, less closely related to core jersey.
Lightweight pro cycling jersey aligns closely with reference product features.
Aero cycling jersey similar in function and silhouette to core jersey.
Women's cycling jersey, very similar product category and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Signal Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical cycling jersey from a well-known brand, very close in features and function.
